records.QueryText: information regarding to fertilizer application  after transplanting rice
records.KccAns: 110 kg urea,27 kg dap or75 kg ssp,20 kg potash /acre  in rice

records.QueryText: information regading flower drop in jamun?
records.KccAns: spray 1.5ml planofix in 4 litre of water per acre.

records.QueryText: urea ka kis hisab se spary karana chahia
moong ka podha sukh raha he.

records.KccAns: Groundnut, bhendi, turmeric, tapioca, banana and Cocoa
g.g.-20 arth veldi and g.g.-2, g.g.-5, g.g.-7,

Pit size- 15x3x1.5 Fit ka banaye, pit ke upar cabar kare, Pit ko bharana 1st layar crops ke Leaf & straw+ 2nd layar Paka huaa Gobar dale+3kg./ Pit verm dale+ 3rd layar Fine straw dale, Bore se dake, 5-8 days interal par water dale, Pit ke charo side 0.5 fit ki nali banaye jisase Ants Pit me najapaye, isa prakar Vermi compost Ferti. 45days me coplites ho jayega. (Govt. Subsidy on Vermi compost- Rs.- 30,000/Set, By- Deptt. of Horticulture)
apply urea 15 kg  + superphosphate 145kg + potash 15 kg /ac
